Name: BOSS
Text: Working remotely like this is fun huh?

Name: BOSS
Text: You get to stay home and just play on your phone.

Name: BOSS
Text: No sawdust, not getting hit by a tree, can't hear the protesters scream.

Name: BOSS
Text: Now let's see. Your score in total today was [wave]$SCORE[/wave].

Name: BOSS
Text: I think I should say [wave]thanks for playing...[/wave]

Name: BOSS
Text: but I'll just say don't be late tomorrow, we continue at 06:00.
